name: Decay (Mohak)
description:
Decay is a short, explorative puzzle game made for the 2023 GoedWare game jam. Explore the abadonded sci-fi facility through it's two levels and complete the game.

Instructions:

  • Download the Decay_Main file, the Decay_Debug is for debugging purposes.
  • Use WASD to move
  • Use Shift to Sprint
  • Press E to Switch Realities
  • The cursor is accidentally locked in the endscreen, you will have to alt+f4.

Sidenote:

Since this is a game jam game I had a limited amount of time to complete it, and as usual, I procrastinated quite a bit, which means that this game might be a little unfinished.

Support

  • It only supports 16:9/1080p, the UI might break if you try other resolutions, but you're free to try.
  • Due to the time limit, the game is very unoptimized and there are no options for graphics settings, so the experience may differ based on your specifications.
